Question: Shenzhen Tommox Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Tommox Technology Co., Ltd

Product: USB Type C PD Charger

- Specializes in R&D, production, and sales of consumer charging products
- Offers OEM and ODM services
- Expertise in Qualcomm fast charging technology, USB C PD3.0, PPS smart fast-charging, and wireless charging
- Products have passed international certifications such as CE, FCC, ROHS, ETL, CCC, KCC, PSE, CB, BSMI, SAFETYMARK, and ISO9001
- Focuses on innovation, long-term cooperation, and maintaining high-quality standards
Summary_cn:
深圳Tommox科技有限公司

產品: USB Type C PD充電器

- 專業從事消費者充電產品的研發、生產和銷售
- 提供OEM和ODM服務
- 專注於Qualcomm快速充電技術、USB C PD3.0、PPS智能快充和無線充電
- 產品已通過CE、FCC、ROHS、ETL、CCC、KCC、PSE、CB、BSMI、SAFETYMARK和ISO9001等國際認證
- 重視創新、長期合作，並保持高品質標準
